data.title: Legal information
data.meta_description: Adobe is committed to clearly communicating your legal rights related to the use of our products and services.
data.text:
Services

Find terms and conditions for Adobe online services, such as Creative Cloud and Acrobat.com.

Learn more ›

Software

Find user agreements and terms for Acrobat, Photoshop and other Adobe software.

Learn more ›

Mobile apps

Get user agreements for Adobe Photoshop Touch, Flash Player, Acrobat Reader and other mobile products and runtimes.

Learn more ›

Experience Cloud products and services

See the terms and conditions for Experience Cloud products and services.

Learn more ›

Support contracts

See the terms and conditions for Adobe support plans. Questions about product downloads and installation?

Learn more ›

Copyrights, trademarks and permissions

Get guidelines and permissions for using Adobe trademarks, images, icons and web logos.

Learn more ›

A reputation for ethics

Adobe has been recognized for several years running by Ethisphere.com as one of the world’s most ethical companies.

Learn more ›
